pages.title: Etchings!
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Etchings$() are a late-game mechanic being introduced with Gear Tier 3 at Level 250!$(br)These provide you with varying extremely strong buffs if you apply 4 matching Etchings to a set of armor

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: Etchings have two primary ways of Obtaining, either through a special Vault Room called the Vault Vendor, which has an entity in the center of the room trading Vault Platinum for Vault etchings with varying prices between 7 - 64 Platinum.$(br)JEI has built-in Integration for Vault Vendors to see all offers and price ranges!
Alternatively to that, you can also craft Etchings via Etching Fragments, which can be obtained by Smelting unwanted Etchings or through other means such as finding them inside the Vault.
